story script.storyline: At an open mic night, a man is surprised and skeptical when an older woman takes the stage. Later in a dressing room, her friends show her love and support.

main characters.appearance: An older woman with gray hair in a bun, wearing glasses, and a brown coat with a white fur trim.
A man with brown hair, wearing a brown suit jacket over a white turtleneck.

main settings.environment: A bar with a stage, a bar area with bottles, and red curtains.
A dressing room with a clothing rack and a white globe light.

visual annotation.narrative caption: A man in the audience questions why an older woman is taking the stage.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: At a bar with red curtains, a man in a brown suit, sitting in the audience behind a table, looks annoyed by the performance and says, "Why did this old bat get on the stage?"

visual annotation.narrative caption: The stage manager announces the open mic night.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: On a stage with red curtains, a poster with the words "Open Mic" is displayed. The stage manager holds a microphone.

visual annotation.narrative caption: An older woman tells her friend that she can't believe she had the courage to take part.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: In a dressing room, an older woman in a brown coat with a white fur trim talks to a younger woman in a green blazer. The older woman says, “I can’t believe I worked up the courage to take part!”

visual annotation.narrative caption: A younger woman tells her friend that she believes in her.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: In a dressing room, a younger woman with blonde hair and a green blazer, looks encouragingly at the older woman and says, “I believe in you!”

visual annotation.narrative caption: A woman in a red dress asks if it is safe for the older woman to go on stage at her age, then another woman tells her not to talk to her like that.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: In a dressing room, a woman with long black hair in a red dress holding a snack asks, "Isn't it dangerous to go on stage at your age?" A younger woman in a green blazer replies, "Don't talk to her in this manner."

story script.storyline: A singer gets upset about the quality of the microphone and refuses to perform. Eventually, an elderly woman takes her place on stage.

main characters.appearance: A young woman with black hair in a ponytail, often wearing dresses. She is initially seen in a red dress and later in a blue one.
A man with brown hair, wearing a dark suit jacket over an orange shirt and a black bow tie.
An older woman with gray hair in a bun, wearing glasses, a pink cardigan over a printed white shirt and a long brown skirt

main settings.environment: A room with blue walls and a pink back wall, featuring a mirror and some chairs
A stage with red curtains, a pale yellow backdrop with musical notes and the audience as dark silhouettes in the background

visual annotation.narrative caption: A singer is seen in the backstage with other girls.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: In a room with blue walls and a pink back wall, a young woman with black hair in a ponytail stands in the center, wearing a red dress, holding something in her hand, and looking ahead. To her left, a blonde woman in a green dress is posing with her hands on her waist. In the background are other blurry figures. At time 00:06, a third woman is visible in a white dress holding music sheets.

visual annotation.narrative caption: Singer 1 refuses to perform because of the poor quality of the microphone.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: A young woman with black hair in a ponytail, wearing a blue dress and holding a green purse, is talking to a man with brown hair wearing a dark suit jacket over an orange shirt and a black bow tie. She is holding a microphone and expressing her refusal to perform.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The organizer explains they don't have money for better equipment and tells the singer to not perform if she doesn't want to.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: The man with brown hair wearing a dark suit jacket over an orange shirt and a black bow tie is explaining that they do not have money for better equipment. He is talking to the camera, while another woman with a microphone stands on the left and is out of the frame.  The background is a wall with multiple small squares and dark silhouettes of people.

visual annotation.narrative caption: Singer 1 cuts the power cord in order to sabotage the performance and announces no one will sing if she does not.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: The young woman with black hair in a ponytail, now wearing a blue dress and holding a green purse, is cutting wires near the floor, expressing her refusal. She looks determined and is in a backstage area with silhouettes of other people visible in the background

visual annotation.narrative caption: Two people are sitting at a table, watching as the stage appears empty
visual annotation.descriptive caption: Two people, a man with brown hair in a brown jacket and a woman with brown braided hair in a purple dress are sitting at a table in front of a stage with red curtains, waiting for the show to begin.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The organizer expresses his disbelief that a janitor is about to perform on stage.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: A man with brown hair in a brown jacket is sitting at a table, expressing his disbelief as an older woman is about to perform on stage, while another woman with brown braided hair in a purple dress watches on from the left of the frame.

visual annotation.narrative caption: Singer 2 begins her performance, and the organizer calls her an old hag.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: An elderly woman with gray hair in a bun, wearing glasses, a pink cardigan over a printed white shirt and a long brown skirt, is on stage, holding a microphone and about to begin her performance. A man with brown hair in a brown jacket is sitting at a table, watching from the front of the frame, expressing his negative comment. There are red curtains at the sides and musical notes floating in the background.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The audience is laughing at the show while Singer 2 performs.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: An elderly woman with gray hair in a bun, wearing glasses, a pink cardigan over a printed white shirt and a long brown skirt, is on stage, performing and holding a microphone. Two people, a man with brown hair in a brown jacket and a woman with brown braided hair in a purple dress are watching from the front, while the audience are dark silhouettes in the background. There are red curtains at the sides and musical notes floating in the background

story script.storyline: A young blonde woman sabotages an electrical cable, and the resulting mishap gives an older woman her big break on stage, making her a star.

main characters.appearance: She has blonde hair tied in a bun, and wears a green blazer, white top, and dark pants.
She has gray hair in a bun, wears glasses, a light shirt with flower patterns, a pearl necklace and a maroon jacket.

main settings.environment: A dark backstage area with red curtains, some equipment and boxes. There are also silhouettes of people.
A warmly lit stage with red curtains, a large speaker, purple music notes scattered about, and a beige backdrop with orange circular patterns.
A dimly lit restaurant with a bar in the back, red curtains in the front, a table with chairs and a green tablecloth, and people sitting at the table.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The young blonde woman walks through the backstage.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: A blonde woman in a green blazer walks past a dark backstage area with red curtains and silhouettes of people.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The young woman crouches and starts tampering with an electrical cable.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: The blonde woman wearing a green blazer crouches on the floor backstage next to a red curtain and starts tampering with a yellow cable on the floor. Silhouettes of people stand nearby.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The young woman discovers that she had cut the cable.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: The blonde woman wearing a green blazer realizes the yellow cable she's holding is cut, while red stage lights are visible in the dark background. Silhouettes of people stand nearby.

visual annotation.narrative caption: Another woman peeks out from behind the curtain and compliments her own work.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: Another woman with black hair in a blue dress peeks out from behind the red curtains in the backstage, as the blonde woman is crouched nearby with a cut electrical wire. The woman in blue says “I did a great job!”

visual annotation.narrative caption: An older woman, wearing a mic, prepares to perform on stage.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: An older woman with gray hair in a bun, wearing glasses, a pearl necklace, a patterned shirt and a maroon jacket holds a microphone on a stage with red curtains. Purple music notes are scattered in the background.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The older woman remembers singing with her partner and becomes emotional.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: An older woman wearing glasses and holding a microphone begins to sing on a stage, with a thought bubble of herself and another older man playing guitars together. The woman begins to cry.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The older woman sings more, crying tears of joy.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: An older woman with gray hair in a bun, wearing glasses, a pearl necklace, a patterned shirt and a maroon jacket, cries and sings into a microphone on a stage. Purple music notes are scattered in the background, as well as a speaker.

visual annotation.narrative caption: People in the restaurant applaud the older woman's performance.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: Four people in a dimly lit restaurant are clapping for a performance, which is behind red curtains. The restaurant has a bar in the back and a table with chairs in the front. Someone says: “This old lady has an incredible voice! Bravo!”

visual annotation.narrative caption: The older woman is congratulated for her performance backstage by the blonde woman and another woman.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: Backstage, the older woman with gray hair in a bun asks how she did to a blonde woman in a green blazer, as well as a woman in a blue dress.  The blonde woman replies: “Granny, you surpassed yourself!”.

story script.storyline: A young woman is upset when she sees her grandmother getting a hug from another woman. The grandmother tells a man that she will inform her granddaughter about an invitation. Later, the young woman takes the grandmother's coat and throws it in the trash, but it turns out that her grandmother is getting a replacement coat from the other woman, and they both are quite happy about it.

main characters.appearance: A young woman with black hair in a ponytail wearing a blue dress.
An older woman with gray hair in a bun wearing glasses, a purple jacket and brown skirt.
A young woman with blonde hair wearing a green jacket.

main settings.environment: A stage with red curtains, and a dark background with silhouettes of people.
A room with a clothing rack containing coats and dresses and lower shelves with shoes and other items.
Outside, with blue background and dark windows

visual annotation.narrative caption: The grandmother is getting a hug from the woman as the granddaughter looks on.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: On a stage with red curtains, a blonde woman in a green jacket is hugging an older woman with gray hair in a bun wearing a purple jacket and brown skirt. On the right side a black-haired woman in a blue dress looks angry.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The granddaughter expresses her disapproval at the hug with a 'meh' speech bubble.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: On a stage with red curtains, the black-haired woman in a blue dress is expressing her disapproval with a 'meh' speech bubble, while a blonde woman in a green jacket hugs an older woman with gray hair in a bun wearing a purple jacket and brown skirt.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The woman and grandmother continue hugging, while the granddaughter is no longer in the frame.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: On a stage with red curtains, a blonde woman in a green jacket is hugging an older woman with gray hair in a bun wearing a purple jacket and brown skirt.

visual annotation.narrative caption: A man in a suit tells the grandmother to perform the following evening.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: In a wardrobe room with clothing racks, a man with gray hair and a blue suit is telling an older woman with gray hair in a bun wearing a purple jacket and brown skirt to come to perform tomorrow evening.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The grandmother agrees and says she will tell her granddaughter about the invitation.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: In a wardrobe room with clothing racks, an older woman with gray hair in a bun wearing a purple jacket and brown skirt is saying that she will inform her granddaughter.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The granddaughter is now present in the wardrobe, and the man tells her that her grandmother has an amazing voice.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: In a wardrobe room with clothing racks, a man with gray hair and a blue suit is telling a black-haired woman in a blue dress that her grandmother has an amazing voice.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The man tells the granddaughter that her grandmother has an amazing voice.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: In a wardrobe room with clothing racks, a man with gray hair and a blue suit is telling a black-haired woman in a blue dress, 'Have you heard her voice? It’s out of this world!'

visual annotation.narrative caption: The granddaughter says she will make sure her grandmother loses the coat and she then throws it in the garbage.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: In a wardrobe room with clothing racks and a garbage can, a black-haired woman in a blue dress says she will make sure her grandmother loses the coat and then proceeds to pick it up and throw it in the garbage can.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The granddaughter's actions are shown as a transparent layer.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: In a wardrobe room with clothing racks, a black-haired woman in a blue dress has a transparent layer showing her earlier actions in the wardrobe.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The woman is giving the grandmother a new jacket as the grandmother seems to have lost her jacket.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: Outside on a street, an older woman with gray hair in a bun wearing a purple jacket is standing next to a blonde woman with an orange hoodie and a jacket with a green and brown pattern. The blonde woman is giving the older woman a new jacket as the older woman seems to have lost her jacket. The younger woman is saying to the older woman, 'Granny, how could you lose your jacket?'

story script.storyline: A young woman worries when her grandmother gets sick after going for a walk without a jacket. She suspects it wasn't an accident and the illness is linked to her replacement in an event where she was scheduled to sing.

main characters.appearance: An elderly woman with gray hair in a bun, wearing glasses and mostly seen in a purple or blue outfit.
A young woman with blonde hair in a bun, mostly seen in a white top and blue jeans, but sometimes in a purple/white or orange outfit.

main settings.environment: A dark blue street with a tree, some abstract shapes and an area that looks like a bus stop.
A pink bedroom with a brown sofa, lamp, bookshelf and an end table.
A stage with red curtains and some spotlights.
A bar with a cash register, some shelves with bottles and two red stools.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The young woman puts a scarf on her grandmother outdoors. The grandmother says someone must have taken her jacket by mistake.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: In a dark blue street scene with a tree, some abstract shapes and an area that looks like a bus stop, a young woman with blonde hair in a bun, wearing an orange outfit, ties a patterned scarf around the neck of an elderly woman with gray hair in a bun and glasses who is wearing a purple outfit.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The grandmother lies in bed, looking unwell. The young woman brings her tea.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: In a pink bedroom with a brown sofa, lamp, bookshelf and an end table, an elderly woman with gray hair in a bun and glasses lies in bed, with a green blanket. A young woman with blonde hair in a bun, wearing a white top and blue jeans, brings her a glass of tea.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The grandmother says she can't perform today.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: Close up of an elderly woman with gray hair in a bun and glasses, lying in bed with a green blanket in a pink room, she says she cannot perform today. A glass of tea is on the end table.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The young woman says her grandmother can't perform because she's coughing non-stop and that it is an odd coincidence.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: In a pink room with a brown sofa, lamp, bookshelf and an end table, a young woman with blonde hair in a bun, wearing a white top and blue jeans, points her finger saying her grandmother can't perform because she's coughing non-stop and it's an odd coincidence. The grandmother lies in bed with a green blanket and a glass of tea is on the end table.

visual annotation.narrative caption: A man introduces a woman on stage, stating the vocalist is sick, so she is singing. The woman thanks everyone for coming to listen.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: On a stage with red curtains and some spotlights, a man in a purple jacket and orange shirt stands on the left as a woman with black hair in a ponytail, wearing a black top and green skirt, holds a microphone and thanks everyone for coming to listen. There are several audience members in the foreground.

visual annotation.narrative caption: A man in the audience says they didn't come to listen to her.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: On a stage with red curtains and spotlights, a man with brown hair, wearing a white long-sleeve shirt in the foreground on the right has his arms folded and says he did not come here to listen to the woman. The young woman on stage holds a microphone and has a puzzled expression.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The woman on stage tells the man to be escorted out and that he is not letting her sing.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: On a stage with red curtains and spotlights, a woman with black hair in a ponytail, wearing a black top and green skirt, holds a microphone, looks angry and demands for the man in the foreground to be escorted out, stating he is not letting her sing. A man in a purple jacket and orange shirt stands on the left.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The man introducing the singer says they are in for someone else this evening, so the singer looks angry.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: On a stage with red curtains and spotlights, a man in a purple jacket and orange shirt stands to the left and says they are in for someone else this evening. The woman with black hair in a ponytail, wearing a black top and green skirt, holding a microphone looks angry and a man with brown hair in the foreground on the right has a solemn expression.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The young woman says it is no accident her grandmother got sick.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: In a bar with a cash register, some shelves with bottles and two red stools, a young woman with blonde hair in a bun, wearing a purple and white long sleeve top and green pants says she thinks it is no accident that her grandmother got sick. A man in a purple jacket and orange shirt stands on the left.

story script.storyline: A man throws away a woman's jacket to stop her granny from singing. The woman confronts him with the jacket, and another woman who seems to be involved in their fight told them to leave. Later, the woman meets the other woman in a store and asks what is she doing here.

main characters.appearance: A middle-aged man with grey hair, wearing a black suit, an orange shirt, and a black bow tie.
A woman with blonde hair in a bun, wearing a black top, white long sleeves, and green pants.
A woman with black hair in a ponytail, wearing a black dress and a green skirt.

main settings.environment: A bar with a shelf of bottles in the background and bar stools in front of the bar.
A dressing room with blue walls, a plant, chairs, and a makeup mirror with lights.
A store with shelves of products and a large sign of medicine pills on the top.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The man asks the woman what she's talking about.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: The scene is in a bar with a shelf of bottles in the background and bar stools in front of the bar. A middle-aged man with grey hair, wearing a black suit, an orange shirt, and a black bow tie, looks to his left and asks a question in a speech bubble, and a woman with blonde hair, wearing a black top, white long sleeves, and green pants is to his right.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The man argues with the woman and says she's ready to do anything to perform.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: In a dressing room with blue walls, a plant, chairs, and a makeup mirror with lights, a middle-aged man with grey hair, wearing a black suit, an orange shirt, and a black bow tie stands on the right and yells at a woman with black hair in a ponytail, wearing a black dress and a green skirt, who has her arms crossed in a chair on the left, while the speech bubble is showing his accusation.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The woman said she won't tolerate the tone of the man.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: In a dressing room with blue walls, a plant, chairs, and a makeup mirror with lights, a woman with black hair in a ponytail, wearing a black dress and a green skirt, sits in a chair and with her arms crossed, she refuses to accept the man's tone. The speech bubble is showing her words.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The woman reveals that the man threw away her jacket to stop her granny from singing and asks how he likes her tone.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: In a dressing room with blue walls, a plant, chairs, and a makeup mirror with lights, a middle-aged man with grey hair, wearing a black suit, an orange shirt, and brown pants stands with his hands down. To his right, a woman with blonde hair, wearing a black top, white long sleeves, and green pants holds a brown jacket on a hanger, and she yells that the man threw away her granny's jacket. The speech bubble is showing her questions.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The man points at the woman and tells her to leave.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: In a dressing room with blue walls, a plant, chairs, and a makeup mirror with lights, a middle-aged man with grey hair, wearing a black suit, an orange shirt, and brown pants stands on the right and points at a woman with black hair in a ponytail, wearing a black dress and a green skirt, sitting with crossed arms on the left, and tells her to leave.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The woman asks if her granny needs anything, and then reveals her granny is sick and she needs to buy her medicines. Then she asked the man to let's go.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: In a dressing room with blue walls, a plant, chairs, and a makeup mirror with lights, a middle-aged man with grey hair, wearing a black suit, an orange shirt, and brown pants stands with his hands down. To his right, a woman with blonde hair, wearing a black top, white long sleeves, and green pants holds a brown jacket on a hanger and ask if her granny needs anything. Then she said that her granny is seriously sick and she is on her way to buy medicine for her. After that, she asks the man to let's go.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The woman asks the other woman what she is doing here.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: In a store with shelves of products and a large sign of medicine pills on the top, a woman with blonde hair, wearing a black top, white long sleeves, and green pants stands on the left and asks a question to a woman with black hair in a ponytail, wearing a black dress and a green skirt in front of her, while she is holding a box of chocolates. Two men are in the background

story script.storyline: A woman apologizes to another woman for her behavior after her grandma feels ill from a pill-laced box of chocolates. The grandma, a frequent audience member at a local bar, discovers her favorite chocolates are tainted and figures out the singer from the bar put pills inside them.

main characters.appearance: A woman with long black hair in a ponytail, red lipstick, wearing a black dress with spaghetti straps, and a dark brown skirt.
A blonde woman with her hair in a bun, red lipstick, wearing a white long-sleeve shirt over a purple top, and green pants.
A woman with gray hair in a bun, wearing glasses and a blue top.

main settings.environment: A store with shelves of items and an advertisement of pills on the wall. Light yellow walls and floors.
A pink bedroom with a bed, a side table, and a bookshelf. A brown sofa is also in the room.
A dark bar or music hall with red curtains and dimly lit tables and seats.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The singer looks concerned and says she is also sick.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: In a store with shelves and a pill advertisement, the singer with black hair in a ponytail, red lipstick, and a black dress, looks to the side and says she is also sick. Another blonde woman is to her left and a man to her right.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The singer apologizes for her foolish behavior and says sorry to the woman's grandma.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: In a store, the blonde woman shakes the singer's hand. The singer is handing the woman a box of chocolates while she apologizes for her behavior and for her grandmother.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The singer asks the woman to give the candy to her grandma.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: In a store, the singer with black hair in a ponytail, red lipstick, and a black dress, asks the blonde woman with her hair in a bun to give her grandma a box of candies. A man stands to the left side.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The woman looks to the side.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: In a store, the blonde woman looks to her side while holding a box of chocolates in her hands. A man stands to her left.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The woman's grandma is in bed, happily eating her favorite chocolates and asking who gave them to her.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: Inside a bedroom, the grandma with gray hair in a bun, glasses and a blue top is in bed and says the chocolates are her favorite. She is eating one while asking who gave them to her. The blonde woman sits beside the bed.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The woman explains the chocolates came from the singer who took the woman's jacket from the bar, and mentions she looks like she is sick.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: In a pink bedroom, the blonde woman explains to her grandma that a singer from the bar who took her jacket gave her a box of chocolates and mentions the singer looks like she is sick. A man in a suit is also sitting on the couch.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The grandma tastes the chocolates and says they taste like putty and also asks what they are.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: In a pink bedroom, the grandma is eating a chocolate, and says it tastes like putty. She holds up a candy and asks what it is.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The woman mentions that the singer put pills in the chocolate, and says she will show her.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: In a pink bedroom, the woman exclaims that the singer put pills in the chocolates and will show her. The man next to her is sitting on the sofa while the grandma is in the bed.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The grandma appears on stage at the bar and expresses happiness to be there.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: The grandma in a yellow shirt is on stage at a bar and exclaims that she is happy to be there. Behind her are tables and other patrons sitting down and applauding.

story script.storyline: A former vocalist spikes candies for the band members as revenge for being kicked out, but the new vocalist discovers this and is praised for it.

main characters.appearance: A man with brown hair and fair skin, wearing a white turtleneck and a green suit.
A woman with black hair in a ponytail, fair skin, wearing a pink dress and a gloomy face
A blonde woman with fair skin, wearing a blue jacket.

main settings.environment: A room with red curtains and a dark background, it seems to be a stage area or backstage of a performance venue. There are tables and chairs visible in some parts of the room. The background is dimly lit.
A backstage area with grey control panels on the wall and some wooden boxes in the background. Red curtains are visible on the right.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The man in green suit claps and says it's good they kicked out the former vocalist. Then, an old woman in green walks by.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: In the stage area with a dark, shadowy background, red curtains, and some silhouettes of people, the man in a green suit stands on the right, clapping his hands, while a man in a pink shirt stands near the left side, looking and clapping with a smile on his face. The man in green suit speaks, expressing satisfaction at the previous vocalist's dismissal. Then, a woman with grey hair wearing a green shirt walks from the left side to the middle of the scene.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The woman in pink dress is presented with a box of candies.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: In a backstage area, with red curtains visible on the right, a woman with black hair, wearing a pink dress stands on the left. A man wearing a black suit with an orange shirt and a bow tie is holding a box of candies and faces the woman. There are wooden boxes and control panels visible in the background.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The man offers the woman candy, but the woman reveals she spiked the candies.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: In the backstage area, the man in a black suit with an orange shirt and a bow tie is holding the box of candies in the center of the frame, saying 'Oh, it's you again? help yourself to candies'.  The woman with black hair in a pink dress, standing on the left side of the man in black suit, takes out a candy. She says that she is not going to eat them, since she spiked them.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The man declares the woman in pink dress is no longer allowed to come there
visual annotation.descriptive caption: In the backstage area with grey control panels and red curtains, the man in the black suit with the bow tie is holding a box of candy in the center of the frame.  The woman with black hair in a pink dress is on the left. The man says 'She's no longer allowed to come here'. A blonde woman in blue jacket becomes visible on the left side of the scene.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The man asks the woman in the blue jacket to be their new vocalist
visual annotation.descriptive caption: In the backstage area with control panels and wooden boxes, the blonde woman in a blue jacket is standing near the left, a man in a black suit with an orange shirt is on the right. The man says 'Ma'am, I'd like you to become our resident vocalist!'. Red curtains are in the background.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The woman in blue jacket hugs an old woman and says she is a real star.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: The scene shows the blonde woman in a blue jacket and an old woman with grey hair and glasses hugging each other.  The woman in blue jacket says 'Granny, you're a real star!' Red curtains are behind them.

visual annotation.narrative caption: The video provides some moral lessons.
visual annotation.descriptive caption: A dark blue background displays text which says 'ENVY CAN CAUSE YOU TO MAKE TERRIBLE MISTAKES.' Followed by 'IT'S IMPORTANT TO STOP IN TIME!'
